name: DATA BITS(DEMO)
description:
Switch between your two characters and save the trapped Bits , its a short demo with only 11 levels,Inspired by Super Meat Boy.

Controls:
move left and right : Left and Right arrow keys
JUMP : Up arrow or Space bar
Color Change : Down arrow or C
Mute music : M
FULLSCREEN : Shift key

CONTROLLER SUPPORT

Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6jSLv1VWaMc&index=9&list=LLSSS0ZZvjOsiYfaNLoLjlJg
